TermDesc:
Galbrena can hold up to 40 points of Afterflame.
In Threshold State, Galbrena restores 8 point of Afterflame when nearby Resonantors in the team casts Echo Skills. Echoes with the same name can only trigger this effect once. This effect resets when Galbrena exits Demon Hypostasis.
While Demon Hypostasis lasts, each point of Afterflame increases the DMG dealt through Basic Attack - Seraphic Execution, Heavy Attack - Flamewing Verdict, Mid-air Attack - Hellsent Barrage, Resonance Skill - Ravage, and Dodge Counter - Purgatory Scourge by 1.5%, up to 60%. This effect is removed upon exiting Demon Hypostasis.
All Afterflame is removed when Galbrena exits Demon Hypostasis.
